title: The Bamboo and the Heather
description: LOVED BY THREE MEN...Born of a robust Scottish sea captain and his young Chinese mistress, Magda MacDougall's beauty was a magnificent blend of East and West. Her delicate features, blazing red hair and superior intellect captivated three very different men-one who awakened her as only a first love can...one who entangled her in a web of espionage...and one whose love gave her the best gift of all, herself......COMPELLED BY INTRIGUE AND ADVENTUREEmbarking on a quest of exceptional bravery and commitment, Magda MacDougall was caught up in the treachery and drama of World War II. As her mission swept her from Shanghai to Hong Kong, from London to San Francisco-and propelled her into the arms of an extraordinary man-Magda MacDougall fulfilled the dreams her beloved father had aroused in her and emerged a woman of indomitable courage, passion and spirit...A MAGNIFICENT STORY THAT SPANS DECADES AND CONTINENTS AND STRIKES THE DEEPEST CHORDS OF A WOMAN'S HEART...
author: Nita Rosemeyer
